member.name: P:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.SkipEventArgs
member.summary: Gets / sets a value indicating whether to not record any information about event arguments. If false, Reflection is used to query the EventArgs variable for those methods that pass it as a parameter.

member.name: P:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.SkipArguments
member.summary: Gets / sets a value indicating whether to not record any information about method arguments. If false, Reflection is used to query the calling method for certain trace issues.

member.name: P:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.TraceLevel
member.summary: Gets / sets the TraceLevel to use.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.ClearListeners
member.summary: Remove all attached listeners.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.AddListener(System.Diagnostics.TraceListener)
member.summary: Add the specified listener.
member.param: A TraceListener to add.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.RemoveListener(System.Diagnostics.TraceListener)
member.summary: Removes the specified listener.
member.param: A TraceListener to remove.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.HasListeners
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether there are currently any attached listeners.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether there are currently any attached listeners.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.ObjectIsNotNull(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified object is not null. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the object to test.
The object to test for null.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.ObjectIsNotNull(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.Object)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified object is not null. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the object to test.
The TraceLevel to use for this trace issue.
The object to test for null.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntLessThan(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is less than the specified maximum. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The integer to compare with the maximum value specified by the HighBound parameter.
The maximum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntLessThan(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is less than the specified maximum. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The TraceLevel to use for this trace issue.
The integer to compare with the maximum value specified by the HighBound parameter.
The maximum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntGreaterThan(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is greater than the specified minimum. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The integer to compare with the maximum value specified by the LowBound parameter.
The minimum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntGreaterThan(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is greater than the specified minimum. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The TraceLevel to use for this trace issue.
The integer to compare with the maximum value specified by the LowBound parameter.
The minimum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntInRange(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is between the range specified by the lowBound and highBound parameters. The value is considered to "pass" if it matches one of the parameters (i.e. the range is inclusive of the parameters.) Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The integer to compare with the lowBound and highBound parameters.
The minimum allowed value of the val parameter.
The maximum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.IntInRange(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified value is between the range specified by the lowBound and highBound parameters. The value is considered to "pass" if it matches one of the parameters (i.e. the range is inclusive of the parameters.) Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the integer to test.
The TraceLevel to use for this trace issue.
The integer to compare with the lowBound and highBound parameters.
The minimum allowed value of the val parameter.
The maximum allowed value of the val parameter.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StringRequired(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified string is not null or empty. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the string to test.
The reference to the string to test.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StringRequired(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified string is not null or empty. Default trace level is Error.
member.param: The name of the string to test.
The TraceLevel to use for this message.
The reference to the string to test.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StartingEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the beginning of an event. Default trace level is Info.
member.param: The object that caused the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StartingEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the beginning of an event. Default trace level is Info.
member.param: The object that caused the event.
An EventArgs that contains the event data.
The TraceLevel to use for this message.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StartingMethod(System.Object[])
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the beginning of a method. Default trace level is Info.
member.param: Zero or more objects representing the parameters of the method.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.StartingMethod(System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel,System.Object[])
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the beginning of a method. Default trace level is Info.
member.param: The TraceLevel to use for this message.
Zero or more objects representing the parameters of the method.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.InCondition(System.String)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the current execution point is within a conditional (e.g. if..else). Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: A description of the conditional of the current execution point.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.InCondition(System.String,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the current execution point is within a conditional (e.g. if..else). Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: A description of the conditional of the current execution point.
The TraceLevel to use for this message.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.InFor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the current execution point is within a for loop (e.g. for, foreach). Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: The current iteration within the for loop.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.InFor(System.Int32,System.Diagnostics.TraceLevel)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the current execution point is within a for loop (e.g. for, foreach). Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: The current iteration within the for loop.
The TraceLevel to use for this message.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.InFor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Records a trace message indicating the current execution point is within a for loop (e.g. for, foreach). Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: The description of the for loop.
The current iteration within the for loop.

The current iteration within the for loop.

member.name: M:TechInfoSystems.TracingTools.Tools.MarkSpot(System.String)
member.summary: Records a general-purpose trace message with the desired description. Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: A string describing the current execution point.

member.summary: Records a general-purpose trace message with the desired description. Default trace level is Verbose.
member.param: A string describing the current execution point.
The TraceLevel to use for this message.
